systemBlueprint.name: artillery
systemBlueprint.title: Artillery Beam
systemBlueprint.desc: Powers a slow, high-powered beam that pierces all shields and does one damage per room hit. More power means faster cooldown.

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_BOSS_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Boss Missile
weaponBlueprint.desc: Artillery that fires 3 missiles that deal 1 damage.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires 3 missiles; 1 damage each; pierces all shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_BOSS_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Boss Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: 2 damage beam with a long trail.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Beam weapon, 2 damage per room with small breach chance.

weaponBlueprint.name: DRONE_BEAM
weaponBlueprint.title: Drone Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: 'Baby's first beam'; Extremely cheap and weak beam weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: DRONE_MISSILE
weaponBlueprint.title: Drone Missile
weaponBlueprint.desc: This should never appear in the store: BUG

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_ION
droneBlueprint.title: Anti-Ship Ion Drone I
droneBlueprint.desc: Slow moving drone that repeatedly attacks the enemy ship with ion blasts

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_MISSILE
droneBlueprint.title: Anti-Ship Missile Drone I
droneBlueprint.desc: Slow moving drone that repeatedly attacks the enemy ship with mini missiles

droneBlueprint.name: BOSS_DEFENSE_2
droneBlueprint.title: Defense Drone Mark II
droneBlueprint.desc: Shoots faster than Mark I and can also shoot down incoming lasers.

droneBlueprint.name: BOARDER_BOSS
droneBlueprint.title: Boarding Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Breaches through the enemy hull and wreaks havoc. Awesome.
